catalog_script_client.name: Append Location To Description

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_b57859658778419005fd63583cbb35fe
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Report Fraud">1d7859658778419005fd63583cbb3547</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Append Location To Description</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    if (g_form.getValue("complaint_type") === "2") {
        g_form.setValue('description', g_form.getValue('description') + ' ' + g_form.getValue('b_location'));
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-02 00:47:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b57859658778419005fd63583cbb35fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Append Location To Description</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Unemployment application" source="x_snc_unemployment">b348079cdb481850afe2ac4e13961971</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Unemployment application">b348079cdb481850afe2ac4e13961971</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b57859658778419005fd63583cbb35fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-02 00:47:33</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
